@iz3_legend wrote:

item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“angelfallen, post:6, topic:453776”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=556618.msg4074809#msg4074809 date=1344707699]
bump, ic3 is doing some excellent development on this server and I plan to play this
[/quote]

Cant wait to see you play![/quote]just waiting on him to fix the skill xp

edit: babe I found out the info you wanted

expert and easy give xp, reg doesn’t

other current bugs/suggestions
-when you click the show staff members thing on interface it shows all players online and it lists them as admins
-hammer isn’t needed to smith
-smelt 5 , 10 , x does not work
-city teles do not work in spell book
-not really a bug but no real way to tele to like goblins without tabs
-slayer needs major work, don’t make it combat based. If you need something to go by asshole_rule made a special slayer skill for me that can be found via the search feature
-farming needs proper configs
-farming needs major work
-herblore needs secondary ingredients
-mining probably should take a little longer to mine a ore, and increases to faster chance as you level
-agility needs major work its quite laggy and can be auto clicked with log
-thieving needs anti bot method
-not all of the range projectiles are correct, not all of the woodcutting projectiles are correct, not all of the mining projectiles are coorect
-crafting and herblore does not have animations
-runecrafting needs moving to home
-switching needs work
-combat is pretty bad, could use some tuning
-attack accuracy needs work, i am 65 attack and still hitting way too many 0’s on goblins
-defence formula is needed
-suggestion: terrain effects for like mining
-skilling shop
-suggestion: make a new option when in the skill/pallas point shops the option should say “effect info” and it would list the item’s effect.
-suggestion: not sure if actually possible but maybe agility instead of run restoration it would somehow speed up running so it runs faster ~^ , also, perhaps higher agility = more chance of evading an attack
-not all of the ancient magick gfx work and nor do all of the ancient magick effects work as they should on npc/players
-fletching interfaces/skill itself could be a lot better, make bolt crafting, dart crafting, etc
-battlestaff creation would be awesome! I had this idea a while back where it is sort of custom but i cba to type it here ask me in game when you get on!
-maybe the starter should reflect how you have the mode set , for example: easy would have the current starter, reg would ahvea lesser value one, and expert you would get like 100gp or something.
-add bankers to skill area so that way we can set pin from there
-while the npc clipping is actually fair it needs some work, i can still attack a monster lets say if i am right by an object, the monster is on another side of the object , then i can attack diagonally with melee
-firemaking needs clipping(maybe world fires? ) make it also so they cant burn in banks and stuff
-take out pots, runite plus bolts , bolts with effects, dragon arrows, take out all rune/drag armor make initiate a monster drop

Read full topic
